reviewText: This is a beautiful opera(a story that you sing)!  I like how Mister Rogers introduces it with a mound of sand in his sandbox.
My children grew up watching Mr Rogers and the "operas" performed in the segments were loved!  This was a special treat that will be treasured a long time -
this episode i remember watching as a kid when it first aired in 1975.it holds up very well after all these years.
